Actions can be used to expose additional functionality to @B_android#support#v4#media#session#MediaControllerCompat_E@ beyond what is offered by the standard transport controls. e.g. start a radio station based on the current item or skip ahead by 30 seconds.

Parameters: int: The current state of playback.
long: The position in the current track in ms.
float: The current rate of playback as a multiple of normal playback.
setState(int, long, float).Description: Set the current state of playback. The position must be in ms and indicates the current playback position within the track. If the position is unknown use @B_android#support#v4#media#session#PlaybackStateCompat#PLAYBACK_POSITION_UNKNOWN_E@. The rate is a multiple of normal playback and should be 0 when paused and negative when rewinding. Normal playback rate is 1.0.
